title: Love TooGoodToGo!
text: The app is easy to use and the cause is something I‚Äôm passionate about. Saving food from being wasted, saving money, it‚Äôs really such a win win! Download the app and have some fun with surprise food.

title: Great app & idea, would love Gluten-free as a filter option
text:
I discovered this app today and I‚Äôm so excited! Grocery prices are outrageous right now and having the option to save money while also keeping food out of the landfill is so wonderful. The app is super easy to use and the options are pretty diverse. This is such an excellent and timely idea and implementation!

I was really surprised to see that when presented with options to filter choices there is an option for vegetarian and vegan but not gluten-free, even though several of the businesses have gluten-free options listed in their online menus and society is embracing gluten-free eating in growing numbers each year. 

My final critique is that even though there is a tab to click labeled ‚Äúallergies and ingredients,‚Äù there are never any listed, just a generic message to check with the listed store. It just seems like if your surprise bag regularly contains a major anaphylactic allergen like eggs, corn, peanuts, tree nuts, soy, dairy, fish, or shellfish, that could be added to the generic message to save lives, plus save time and energy for all involved. When selling food items, it‚Äôs the expedient and responsible thing to do. For these reasons I felt like I could only give four stars for now.

title: Urban great. Rural no good
text: In Brooklyn it seems great. In small cities or outside then no options at least in some. Hopefully it will keep growing.

title: A's Kitchen rocks!
text:
Their food is fresh, hot, delicious and generously portioned!

The staff is personable, friendly, and courteous.

The restaurant is clean and inviting.

title: Cancelled orders
text: Wasted gas and time since they cancel orders right during pick up time. Has happened to me many times. Going to uninstall so I don't waste anymore time or resources on this app

title: Zero customer service
text: I used too good to go to grab several surprise bags until one day a restaurant was closed when I showed up at my appointed time. I‚Äôve emailed several times and haven‚Äôt gotten a response outside of a form email. Super frustrating and I‚Äôll have to stop using the app.

title: First use
text: First time I used this app‚Ä¶I paid for a ‚Äúsurprise ‚Äú bag at Mountain Mikes Pizza.  I was there the next day at correct time to pick up and the manager said they did not have anything.  No refund.  No apology.  Deleted.

title: Good value but few options
text: Good experience but I wish there were more restaurants/options. It‚Äôs really limited to just a few places so it doesn‚Äôt really make it worthwhile that much to use the app.

title: Taste Plant based prepared meals!
text: Glad this store is nearby. Great food. Healthy too. YOU should try it. We should all eat more plant based. Its a win win win.

title: What a great service
text: Amazing value for what you get and we‚Äôre helping local stores and the environment, what‚Äôs not to like?!!

title: Wow!

title: Great value also to test new places or foods
text: New to this but have tried 3 different locations. The food has been more than worth the price. The thing I like best is I‚Äôm also getting to try some different menu items I‚Äôve never tried before, as well as some I have. Great also if you carry lunch the next day.

title: might be good for big city

title: Love the business but not the app
text:
This is a really neat way to reduce food waste. My gripe is about notifications: I would love to know when things become available at specific stores, but this isn‚Äôt an option. Relatedly I don‚Äôt want notifications from places I haven‚Äôt designated as favorites. 
The new update seems to have removed information about when a place sells out their bags, which I miss as it helped me know when to check the app. 
Good luck to the app and developers and thanks for this pipeline

title: Not enough options
text: It‚Äôs only ever donuts and cookies in my area.

title: Big saver for me!
text: Absolutely a big lightening up for my struggling life! Thanks for all the kindness and warm hearts!

title: Highly recommend
text: You see time and time again big corporations tossing food rather then donating and this is a great attempt to end it, hopefully more restaurants join this. Found this app on TikTok

title: Be careful.
text: This app seems like a great idea. But I have only used it twice and I‚Äôve gotten sick the next day both times. The first time was a fish market so, duh, that was on me but the second time was pastries from a well established coffee place. Just be careful out there, people.

title: Remarkably invasive user agreement & tracking
text: Remarkably invasive user agreement & tracking despite not being available in my area. I‚Äôll wait to be tracked and exploited for my data until I get something out of it. Good luck in Indiana though, people here would destroy their own meal to deny someone who isn‚Äôt identical to them. Thanks.

title: Omg such a great deal!
text: There were other customers buying donuts at the regular prices‚Ä¶while the store was packing two dozens of donuts and pastries from the same shelves for us!! These donuts are no leftovers.

title: Great for the planet
text: Wonderful idea! Love being able to treat my family to restaurant food during these difficult times. Its great for the planet and your wallet. Thank you to whomever created this app! I hope to pick up and order at least once a week!

title: One word!!
text: Yes!!

title: Doesn‚Äôt work for food allergies
text: I love the premise and those without food allergies should definitely try this! But in dietary restrictions there are no choices for food allergies, it only has options like vegetarian or vegan. It says that if you go to pick up a bag you have to talk to the store about food allergies. I submitted an email through their contact portal to ask about this, because that would be a big waste of my time to constantly be going to pick up bags I can‚Äôt end up eating. The response I got was that they don‚Äôt respond to individual requests and I should follow their social media. Why isn‚Äôt there just an option for the restaurant to mark that this bag doesn‚Äôt work for me and shouldn‚Äôt be offered to me. I‚Äôm sure someone else wants it and then I don‚Äôt waste my time. I‚Äôm very allergic to gluten and also dairy, but I am neither vegetarian nor vegan. Nor would selecting either of those options fully cover my allergies.

title: This needs to get out to more restaurants and stores!!!
text: My first one was an amazing experience! The app is super user friendly. Can‚Äôt wait to keep going with this‚Ä¶ the staff was really excited to give it and I was really happy to be taking part in the cause. Not to mention it will be a life saver with the cost of food these days and again; an great win for the planet. Doing my part one thing at a time. Will recommend to everyone!

title: ‚Äúsold out‚Äù instead of ‚Äúsold out at xx PM‚Äù :(
text: how dare u remove the time when it says when it got sold out. it was the only thing keeping my stalking habits healthy :(

text: Connection gets lost all the time. Need to restart my device to make it work. My app will not accept Apple Pay. Very annoying.

title: Foodie

title: Great
text: Works well, almost always great experiences

title: Sarasota
text:
This was a fun experience for me. There are companies on here I wouldn‚Äôt often go to, or even know about! I was introduced to a new small local Italian deli  that I have never been to. I bought some meatballs and marinara while I was there and loved it! It was a great value and it made making dinner easy peasy! It‚Äôs a win win! It‚Äôs  free advertisement for the company because I have been telling everyone about it and for me it was like getting surprise gifts (yes I paid $ for it) but it was a small amount of $ and I loved surprise bag of stuff. I would love to see more companies near me do this. I love supporting local! 
I did learn that I couldn‚Äôt pick up until my given time, actually I could do it 10 minutes early. This was due to how the app works, not the company.

title: Terrible in Minneapolis
text: Herbie Butcher makes you drive there for pickup after paying, and then they do not have the food for you.  It‚Äôs a waste of time and gas. They should only post the food if there is extra.  What a waste of time and a negative environmental impact to be driving places for no reason.

title: ESG lies
text: This app makes ridiculous claims about saving the environment. I‚Äôm sorry but when users are driving  several miles then leaving their cars idle while they pick up food scraps before closing, you‚Äôre not helping the planet. Stop deluding your users with virtue signaling emails.

title: Great quality food & friendly staff
text: I really appreciate the friendly helpful staff & high quality food here. Never been disappointed in my purchases here.

title: Excellent! Nice place to work out back
text: Great pick up got some good variety! Then grabbed coffee and hung on back porch area which was covered! Excellent customer support and place!

title: amazing concept
text: i absolutely love this app! i very rarely write reviews but this app is amazing for reducing food waste and getting a good amount of food for cheaper. i highly recommend it to everyone! i've been telling everyone about it

title: Store ran out
text:
I was so excited to use this app. Then the very first time I did, I go 20 minutes out of my way to pickup a meal at 9pm.

When I showed up, they told me they had run out of food. So I left empty handed and then got a message from To Good to Go support telling me that it might be a while to get my refund because they have a backlog of support requests‚Ä¶ sounds like others are experiencing the same issue.

Save yourself the hassle and stay away.

title: Love the idea
text: Great idea to not waste food. However, I wish we could post/read reviews. I got a bag of rolls and a couple of cookies. Not exactly what I was expecting.

title: Trying it for the first time!
text: This app is great! I love the places they pick and the food is great value and taste.

title: Best idea to save on food waste yet!
text: With food waste being such a problem in the US I quickly jumped on to this app. The prices and low and the food is plentiful (and not trashed). This is also right on time for my financial situation right now too. Helping me get meals when I need to pinch Pennie‚Äôs the most!

title: Such a great app
text:
This is such a wonderful app. I have loved using it and gotten so much food through it. 

I love the map feature and searching based on your location. I love that when you click on a stop you can have the choice of google or Apple Maps to get directions. It makes it so easy. Purchasing and picking up seems to be so easy. 

There are a few things that I think would make it better. 
1. The sorting options should show you things in order of the pick up time. I got out of a work training yesterday and wanted to see if I could grab dinner anywhere. There as an option but it took me a while to search through. I‚Äôd love to see an option to see the items listed by pick up time. I would spend more money on here if it was quicker access. 
2. I feel as though I have to look through multiple locations to actually see all the different places that are offering food that isn‚Äôt sold out. I don‚Äôt even know if the Browse shows them all or not. I wish there was one spot to know I was visually seeing them all. 
3. I wish there was a way to hide stores you don‚Äôt like. I will never order from this one donut shop in our town and they have 3 locations. I don‚Äôt like their donuts and yet every day I have to scroll through their listing for multiple of their locations. I wish there was a way to just hide the company as I will never purchase from there 

Again these are all things that would make me buy more and use this more. Great app and concept and I love it. Take my money!

title: Genius app
text: Great way to save money and great way to not waste food. Staff at Dunkin‚Äô Donuts were very friendly and generous. Will definitely come back and continue doing the surprise bag from them.

title: Haven‚Äôt ordered anything yet
text: Love the idea, but I never make it to the stores I favorited. I wish a push alert for your favorites could go out so one knows when it‚Äôs available. It‚Äôs a great concept though.

title: 1st experience great
text:
Just need to add more vendors. 
Most is bakery items.

title: This app is FRAUDULENT
text: My experience with using this app is I paid $5 for a ‚Äúsurprise bag‚Äù from a local ice cream shop. When I showed up the worker said he never had nothing to give me and that this was often the case with people who purchase on TooGoodToGo. There is no communication between the shop and TooGoodToGo. They accept your payments and the transaction ends there.  There is no accountability by TGTG customer service. Just submit a request for refund and they‚Äôll assume next time it‚Äôll work out.
